Container.Name: CKPool
Container.Overview:
Run your own SOLO MINING POOL Requires a BTC Address â€“ Preferably a *Coinbase receive Account* as Pool Wallet.
Please Review: - https://github.com/golden-guy/ckpool-solo - https://hub.docker.com/r/pinkyswear/ckpool-solo
This Unraid template supports custom IPs, ports, and Bitcoin node integration over RPC.
*You MUST run a full Bitcoin node with `txindex=1` and `prune=0`.
Sample `bitcoin.conf` options used in node to run ckpool: server=1 rpcuser=bitcoinrpc rpcpassword=yourstrongpassword rpcbind=0.0.0.0 rpcport=8332 rpcallowip=172.0.0.0/8 txindex=1 prune=0
#Bitcoin Node: .bitcoin -banlist.json -bitcoin.conf -bitcoind.pid -debug.log -fee_estimates.dat -mempool.dat -peers.dat -settings.json
#This Docker: conf -ckpool.conf
This Docker connects via RPC to the Bitcoin Node.
Container.Requires: !!! Depends on another docker running a FULL Bitcoin Node!!! You MUST run a full Bitcoin node with txindex=1 and prune=0 May Also Require a CoinBase Account as Pool Wallet A Wallet for BTC send/receive address...
